TopicTitle: Any tutorials on how to make my own shaders?

Articles.Content: Hi! I would like to create my own shaders for KSP, but don't know where to start because I couldn't find any tutorials on the subject. If anyone has any info or suggestions on how to make shaders, I'd appreciate it if you shared them with me!

Idk if this will help you or not. I ran across this while investigating the feasibility of a shader producing a depth map companion image to a regular color screenshot, in order to support non-destructive, post-processing depth of field manipulation. The person in the video literally writes a custom shader on screen. Might not be the subject you're after but hopefully something will prove helpful.
Thanks! I make sure to check it out.
